ComicInfo.Summary:
The Smoky Realm [Part 1]: Chief Mikki of the Undermen calls on Samson for help repelling an invasion through the subway tunnels. That done, Mindor, concludes that the invaders came from the underground network of Radio City. Samson and his friends are discovered as they spy on Zalg, leader of the Gnarly Men, planning an attack on N'Yark. Trying to escape, they run into the pit of a fire-breathing dragon.
The Ninety Minute Menace: Disasters strike Astro City every 90 minutes, and Tom figures out that the problem is one of the war satellites that wrecked civilization -- defective, but with its radioactive beams still deadly. With great struggle, Tom uses his mental powers to push the satellite out of orbit and into space.
[The Smoky Realm] Part Two: The Call to Arms: Using the atomic-powered monitors of Radio City, Mindor discovers that the Gnarly Men are being forced to invade the surface because their magic breeze (atomic-powered air conditioning) has ceased to work. Gathering ancient manuals he gains a truce, racing against time and suspicious Gnarly Men even as Samson fends off dragons. Mindor succeeds and Samson seals off the monsters. Chef Zalg and the Grand Chief of N'Yark conclude a treaty, and Samson heads home to catch up on his sleep.
Stiff Chicken: A rooster mistakes a bag of cement for a bag of corn, eats some, drinks water, and becomes solidified.
ComicInfo.Title: The Smoky Realm [Part 1]; The Ninety Minute Menace; [The Smoky Realm] Part Two: The Call to Arms; Stiff Chicken
